name: Irish Johnson
text: I paid for the $10 car wash with a $20 bill and it didn't give me my change back. I'm not the first person this has happened to and probably won't be the last. The issue needs to be resolved and I would like to be given my change !!

name: Tracy Singleton
text: I purchased the unlimited plan (though there is a monthly limit) only to have the system stop recognizing my tag. The first month was fine but the second month I was only able to get 3 washes. The third month has charged to my account and it still doesn't recognize my tag.

name: Charles Crawford
text: Only the touch less car wash has a card reader it would be better if the other bays had car readers and the vacuums are coin operated only .

name: Debra Coker
text: The first vacuum didn't work. The second vacuum stopped working before I finished. Added more money but it never came back on. The automatic car wash wouldn't take cash either.

name: Dr. Jack Overcasher, Sr.
text: Great local(only) car wash around with reliable equipment. Would have given 5 stars except for the fact that it's generally pretty dirty just about every time I go there. Other than that no problems.

name: Amanda Pipkin
text: I used the self wash. Of the 3 stalls only 2 were open. The one I had to use was rickety. You could barely read the numbers on the timer so it was hard to tell how much time you had left. The main reason for my review though, is I would like to inform people of the pink car soap... IT STAINS!!!! It stained my hands pink. My shoes r pink around the rubber and from glops of foam that fell from the leaking dispenser. And it didnt even clean that well. So... I spent 8 bucks.... to knock some dirt off my car, ruin my brand name shoes and have my hands look like I've been playing in Easter egg dye. Wont do that again....

name: Tavoris Mcconnell
text: Mannnn I feel like they gyp'd me every setting it took all my time just for the soap or tire cleaner etc to actually start dispensing.....

name: Maggie Jones
text: I just went to this car wash and I used my debit card. I selected the basic wash for $6 and my transaction to my account was charged $10. Beware and don’t let this happen to you. I’ve tried calling the number that is listed on line for the business, but have had no success.

name: The Woke Unicorn
text: Great place. I was looking for a Goo Goo Car Wash because I’m familiar with that chain, but this was just as great quality. Similar set up to Good Good, clean, and friendly place.

name: Angela Walker
text: Everytime I visit the vacuums are down. Every. Time.

name: David Foster
text: Touch free washes are great and well worth the money

name: SHEILA BISHOP
text: Get this Alabama  Red dust off my car! Your typical car wash.

name: Ken Meeks
text: Best carwash around.

name: Chastity Barren
text: The machine washes good

name: David Stewart
text: Very convenient and clean

name: Kisha Crosby
text: They need to fix they machine

name: Lasonya Leggett
text: Terrible!!!!

name: Stacey Steiner
text: I have passed the place several times for work. I work for homeless shelter that owns a duplex close to there that is rented out as transitional housing. I have gone there several times in the past month or so, waiting on repair people. The car wash is very close. The loud noise and vulgar rap music is terrible. I promise, I will never pay to use that place. There is a privacy fence between where I wait and car wash. I don't see anything but hear plenty.

name: Douglas Roy Winston
text: It was magnificent.

name: Gdawg Steppin
text: Don't waste your time or MONEY! Some fella comes up and says I'm next and to go to the next stall. I said I got it, this one doesn't work? He said it works. After sticking $5 in the damn thing and still not getting any sign it was working I started flipping the dial. Finally WATER started coming out. JUST water. and after a MINUTE that quit. NO, it doesn't work. Should have known better just from the location   :/

name: Erin Earnhardt
text: Opening soon!

name: Pamela “don't give a Dam” Fair
text:
I know Somebody will be there to Help you
So,please tip them so they don't ask

name: Shelby Sandlin
text: Dont go here.

name: christopher marshall
text: It see me weekly

name: Renee' Jackson
text: Cool clean and close to me

name: Nicole Duncan
text:
(Translated by Google) one in

(Original)
Um no

name: Tyler T
text: Place is a joke. Hand written wash markers on machines, change machine is taped over, and no card reader. Could be great if they would fix it and update it since there is no other wash on the island.

name: Jon B
text: To whom it may concern: I put $5.00 worth of quarters in and received nothing more than water. Zero, and I mean ZERO soap. I even tried the brush and suds and nothing came out.  I could have saved my money and time and used the garden hose...... after talking to other locals it is obvious the owner is aware of this and just leaves his facility in poor working order knowingly and relies on the one time users in light of Dauphin Island being a high traffic tourist area where many don’t know of the extortion.

name: Clay Bennett
text: Deposited money, turned on wash and the hose was busted near the handle. Water shot all over me. Completely impossible to wash my truck and I was soaked because of it. Maintain your equipment! 1st wash station closest to road

name: Charles Froseth
text: The worst car wash I’ve ever used. Vacuum was out of commission and the only car wash bay open did not have soap. Have used it 6 times. Each was a bad experience.

name: Joyce Tate
text: Put $2.25 in and no spray. Don't waste your money. And there's no telephone number to report issues.

name: Steve Miceli
text: No soap.. 3 bucks for a rinse. Vacuume was broken...no phone number to even call.. pass on this place .. They do not deserve your money

name: Jennifer C. Whitfield
text:
Out of soap, all bays !

No telephone number to contact either.

Sad.

name: john turner
text: Just went by to wash the truck and found that two out of the four stalls don't seem to have power and took $0.25 each from me. And the other two one has a brush hooked up and no sprayer, the other has a sprayer and a broken brush. I tried to use the stall with the sprayer and the broken brush but it just took my money and wouldn't work. Sounded like a pump turned on but no water or soap came out. Pretty disappointed, I'm glad it only cost me $2.50. I was looking for a number to call the owner to try to get my money back or at least complain but I suppose leaving this piss poor review is the only outlet I have.

name: D
text: Just don't.

name: Ed Shikoski
text: Nothing works!

name: jsmes wezt
text: Great self service wash and vacuum

name: Karen Harbin
text: Can always count on this location to have everything operational!!! What a relief!!! 😊👍

name: Joseph Rudnicky
text: No soap in 1 stall other stall coin machine broke.

name: Deano Allnutt
text: JQV3+87 Warwick, Mobile, AL has broken sprayers won't come back to this place

name: Mr. & Mrs. Peyregne
text: Trash over flow, bad vacuums, and low water pressure

name: Andrew Ray
text: Horribly miss manage. Owner is rude

name: Dianne Stewart
text: Machine stole my money and there is no numbers for contact

name: john thompson
text: Good and bad. I have had really bad experiences with losing money because everthing was broken. Owner doesn't check equipment often enough. It's a good place when its running fine but soap smells like rotten eggs or sulphur and car wash brushes have had oil in them multiple times actually very often. I washed my whole car with a brush full of oil and it took forever to get it off my car. 'Cost me money ' I was mad. Anyhow maybe they will check it more often who knows?

name: Solomon Moreno
text:
Update 29APR2018:
Much much better experience with the wash wand and soap brush.  High pressure soap was dispensed and the lather was shooting out of brush ready to go.  Still lots of trash left by previous users of that bay, my motto is leave it better than how you find it so I picked up the wet paper and empty plastic bottles.  If that weren't the closest car wash I wouldn't even bother, but it is and I still cringe when I pull into the bay.  So for a better washing experience, only, I will upgrade my star to 2.

Update:  This disaster for a self care was has shown some improvements such as cleaner bays and seems to be less trash.  If other self wash owners were to see this place they would think it's run by the homeless.  No high pressure soap and the labels on my bay had some labels and the others had the ink running like a blondes eye masquera.

Place is a disaster cause it looks like Hurricane Katrina hit it.  The wash wands are trash along with the vacuums, there is trash everywhere and for the amount of money I spend there I feel like I should be paid to use that disappointing car wash.

name: Dr. Steve
text: Best place to go in West Mobile, when you need a self serve car wash. I am a little bit biased about this particular car wash because someone dear to me owns this car wash.

name: Earl Stevens
text: It's nothing fancy it does the job

name: David Kerr
text: Hose pressure was low and had to wait minutes at a time for the soap to start spraying, eating up your time.

name: Mossberg Shockwave
text: I'm a member here it's ok. I wish the owner would fix things. Things stay broken or not working properly for a long long time. Like vacuums would just fall off at the head or the mat cleaner machine doesn't work. Guess I won't be a member much longer if this continues but it is convenient being close to home I think that's why I've stayed so long otherwise out.

resp.text:
We are sorry about your experience
Please let us know when you are on site
It’s takes few seconds to fix
It depends on previous user
Again we are extremely sorry and will try to keep up with it

name: Kim Ouellette
text: Good car wash.  I do wish they would do a better job prepping my car..always still dirty around my plate.

resp.text: Kim, thank you for your review. Your concerns have been shared with the owner and we will make sure to make this a point of emphasis for our staff. In the future we hope to change your experience from good to great.

name: Lonnie Streeter
text: Decent car wash, but bring your own towels.

name: Don Frezell
text: Always clean and does a great job on our vehicles. The owner Jay will always check on you and make sure you are happy when he is on

name: ALLEN WILLIAMS
text: They have the beat prices for a Car Wash. The equipment is all was in good condition so it want mess up your  paint

name: Bryan Harrison
text: Quick and easy car wash.  Never had a problem going through.  One time fee and you can get a towel each time you go through.  Vehicles always look good afterwards.

name: KevinLisa Pate
text: We love this car wash, we are actually up this way every Sunday, and use this wash, it's very clean and friendly

name: kellie jenkins
text: Everything you need for a small town car wash. They offer monthly packages too. Very clean.

name: Kenneth Rehme
text:
Close to home, this place is convenient and, with a membership, saves a bunch on regular washes. The more you go, the more you save. The quality of the wash is very good and the customer service is good.
The only thing that would make it better would be free towel service.

name: Danny Hill
text: Great place!

name: ima Horn
text: The girls working the place were nice.

name: Michele Klemm
text: I went Saturday morning. The attendendts were friendly and very through. Car wash got all of the bugs off of the front of the car and the windshield. I highly recommend this car wash to everyone! Great Customer service! Great Car wash for the price! Towel program is right on point. The towels were clean and removed everything from dust to  cleaning the windows. I love to give my money back to the local business owners. Keep up the great job!

name: Mary Libb
text: Vaccums don't have enough suction.

name: thatdisabledude33
text: Good overall

name: Wes Christie
text: Does a great job. Free vac and air (spray the dust off your dash!). Car is always very clean after going through this wash

name: Gary Rush
text: Great facility with very nice staff. We can always depend on Wash It Off to keep our vehicles clean and presentable.

name: Jerry Sims
text: We purchased the 7$ carwash simply to get the pollen off the car.  When we pulled up two young boys were attending the entry, one on his phone the other spraying the car with some type of spray.  We went through the wash and it seemed to be doing fine but on exiting the car was not even close to dry.  I went up to the entry and one of the young men asked how he could help and I told him I needed a towel to dry off my car.  He asked what price package I got and when I told him he said that the $7 wash does not provide the deluxe dry and to get it I would need to by the $$$ price.  I didn't say anything but my mind came up with a great solution.  I will go back to MARC -1in Alabaster where they understand that a half A.... job does not get customers but once.

resp.text:
We are very sorry about your inconvenience at the wash. We are also sorry that we failed to fully explain the drying system on our different washes. Our Fire & Ice and Blazing washes include dry and shine unlike the basic and deluxe washes. If there's anything we can do to help your previous experience, please let us know as soon as possible. Customer service is our number one goal. Please contact us with any regards or concerns.
(205)620-9274
620wash@gmail.com

name: Storey Rowell
text: This is the worst car wash I've ever been to. It does not clean your car and you have streaks of dirt on your car after you go through the wash! Not sure how you would fix this but the owner should definitely look into it. Love the vacuums. Please fix the wash!

name: Elizabeth Davenport
text: Quick, simple, affordable. In and out in less than 10 minutes.

name: Vincent
text: Don't go here if you have an antenna on your vehicle. One of the employees yanked out my antenna by using a pair of pliers instead of using the pliers to twist off the antenna. If he would've asked me how to take the antenna off, I would've done it myself. I am thankful that they will reimburse me for the new antenna. That does not negate the fact I am inconvenienced by getting the remnants of my broken antenna out of my vehicle and going to buy a new antenna.

name: Sally “Sally” M
text: The staff this morning were rude and obviously didn't want to be there. Ask for a clean cloth and when I turned around he slammed the lid down and about made me jump out of my skin  .  I will drive to Pelham from now on.

resp.text:
Sandy
I  am sorry for how you felt
Please give us one more chance and we will make sure everything is good and clean and people who works enjoy working

name: Diana Barefield
text: This place is lacking in every department! My vehicle was still dirty the vacuums were awful! The wash put a dent on my truck. Would not recommend anyone going here. Very dissatisfied customer.. I would wash my truck by hand before having to go here ever again!

resp.text:
I am sorry for that
Did you talk to the employees in charge
Can you give us one more chance
Ask for Jay

name: Joey Smith
text:
When they first opened all was good except the fact the automatic dryer did a poor job of drying my truck.  Employees recognized it and were quick to grab you a towel and in some cases even dry the car by hand for me as a sign of excellence service .  At the time it was managed by a very nice and professional young lady.  The place was also packed with cars which is a great sign for business .  Out of know were if you asked for a towel to dry the water there dryer missed after spending 18.00 dollars they wanted an extra 5 dollars to simply use a used towel. Not to purchase towel to keep but 5 bucks just to use the towel.  I never came back except one time to wash my company truck in a pinch.    I then noticed they had a towel program you pay monthly and the place clearly had lost a ton of business as its usually not very busy.  So sad an arrogant greedy cheap owner didnt learn the basics of running a business in business school.   1 year later today I took my personal truck that I was going to dry myself at home the same truck that had been through the wash many times before they turned my truck away after paying them.   They informed me they know longer except trucks with oversize aftermarket tires which over 30 percent of trucks these days have .  No other car wash has that policy .  Either tire fits on the track or it doesnt .  Reason for decision was having to replace rollers more often than without trucks with 34 inch tires or bigger going through the wash .  So being a cheap wad which is very common in his culture is resulting in lost business.  Clearly a hard headed person .

A simple paper hand written sign could have been posted but instead I waited 5 minutes for them to refund my money then had to drive through vacuums at a sharp angle which almost resulted in my truck hitting there pole.  Not one person tried to guide me or be on the lookout for what I couldn't see. It's now  Ran by a bunch of high school kids who can give zero ducks about customer service .   I now use Anthony in Pelham but was making exception today as I was in a pinch.   Best wash is mister car wash on 280 but I dont leave on that side of town.  A car wash banning big trucks in Shelby county ?  Wow what an idiot .

name: Greg Smith
text: After going through I still had bug guts on the front of my car and the wash didn't even touch most of the tail end. I asked the guy working there if I could run it back through. His plan was to just use a soapy sponge sponge, so after $18 my car is still dirty. I read several reviews, your carwash needs work or you're going to lose a lot of business.

resp.text:
Gregory Smith we are extremely sorry for your dissatisfaction . The soapy sponge helps to get the bugs off easily then the machine .
If you can give us an opportunity we will make sure to your satisfaction
When you come please ask for Jay
We will appreciate it sir

name: Austin Ehrhart
text: Wash quality was ok, but not as good as others in the area. Not sure if the machines are not calibrated properly or if they are not using liquids properly. My small car was only a little dirty, and I was still wiping wet dirt off with the towel after I got my wash.

name: M. D.
text: No free towels to use, and the wash is not as good as Blue Rain in Pelham, which offers free towels

name: Mark Ware
text: Super friendly staff and a great automated wash.

resp.text: Thank you Mark

name: Paul Todd
text: Favorite car wash

name: Matt Besecker
text: Bought the top tier $18 car wash and then spent 20 minutes rinsing the soap off at the vacuum area. Overpriced and does not deliver. Also had to towel off a lot of black oily liquid from my rims as well. Will not go back.

resp.text:
We are extremely sorry for your experience.
We wish you could have talk to person in charge .
Can you email us your email address please.
We would like to make sure you are satisfied
Thank you
Jay
620wash@gmail.com

name: Candie Bowen
text: Workers were extremely rude!

name: Lena Webb
text: I can't use my hands for the machine and they help

name: Cassie Connell
text: This place is so dirty there is trash everywhere and none of the car wash bays are working. They are shoved full with quarters and I would definitely not suggest going here.

name: Theresa Plunk
text: Not a bad place but they just put in old standard car wash not a hand wash.  They also put a dent in my rear door. As he pulled back up to building from car wash to vacuum.  The man forgot to close rear door.  Pulled forward and my door hit edge of building.  Unfortunately they did nothing about it.  Not even a discount on car wash.  Just an I'm sorry. Guess that's better than nothing.  If I wasn't standing there witnessing it happen I doubt I would have gotten that much.

name: Patricia Knowles-Shreve
text: Dropped my car off to get a inside and out wash, very happy with the results. They even cleaned the floor mats and door panels for me even though it didn’t show it as included! Will probably be back again for a full detail later.

name: Pete Santorelli
text: I've been a customer for 6yrs and this place has always treated me well. They're professional, courteous, and always take care of my vehicles. They are almost always quick with turning around my vehicle. I stick with the full service and get it every couple weeks. Will continue recommending this place!

name: Tim Stewart
text: I was really surprised to read the reviews on here AFTER I had my car detailed. The Bailey Cove location had been recommended by my daughter. The receptionist who made the appointment was incredibly friendly and helpful. I was told the car would be ready at 4:30 and they called at 3:00. I had the ultimate detailing and certainly got my money's worth. The car interior and exterior looks brand new. This was a great experience from scheduling to picking up the car. I was even able to pay with my iPhone using Square which was a novel experience. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them!

name: Courtney Moore
text: Always professional and courteous!!!

name: Brad Hall
text: They do a fine job cleaning, but they used a really strong tropical scent that lingered forever.

name: Red Kerusso
text: Proffessional and seamless cleaning.   They demonstrate a tenacious commitment in making your vehicle look new.  By far the best car wash business I've been to in a while.  Appreciate you and your core values. I bring all my family's vehicles here

name: Carolyn Carter
text: I had the Express Wash last week and was VERY satisfied! They ALWAYS do a great job and are very nice and polite. I've never had any issues and I will continue to drive the hour that it takes me to get to Huntsville, to come here for a great car wash.

name: Will P.
text: I have come to this place for detailing many times and have always been satisfied, the staffs is friendly and professional, and the service is great. I have found early morning is best to save time. I will keep coming back.

name: George Mantis (G-Man)
text:
3 stars for Jones Vallley, 1 star for Madison, averages to 2 stars. The Jones Valley location used to be great. Now they can never even start on your car without at least 2 hours’ wait, regardless of time of day or how busy they are. Under their previous manager, they were fast and always professional, with never a problem. Not any more.

As for Madison... After 8 years of bringing my cars here and nowhere else, I will never do business with them again. I brought my car one day for a full detailing ahead of a lease return. My appointment was for 10am but I brought them my car at 9am. The receptionist told me it'd be done by close of business (5pm). I called at 4:30, and was told 6:30. Then it 6:00 they called to say 7:30. Then at 6:30 they asked if I could wait until tomorrow!?! They had my car ALL DAY and did nothing, even with an appointment. The owner offered only superficial apologies and lots of excuses - "we're very busy" (but I had an appointment!) "it's cold out" "we're not machines." Customers - especially repeat ones accustomed to excellent service - don't want to hear excuses.

name: Jon Bierer
text: Prices are great, service is great. Didn't know they were going to take my car to the wash rack next door to wash, so I was confused at first. They brought it back and detailed it. Looks beautiful.

name: TomKat Fleming
text: Very Disappointed! Using Groupon, I had 2 vehicles washed and waxed at the Jones Valley location  the same day. First, the positive: Both the young man and young lady who waited on us were courteous, friendly, and professional. The wax jobs appear good. The negative: on our SUV, the wax was applied over a non-clean roof and bug splats on the hood. We paid extra to clean the interior of each. This was not the $125 interior detail, just a $12.95 interior cleaning. Not sure what that was to include but since there was an attempt to clean the window and vacuum, I assume that was included. We removed all items from the car to make this easier. On our SUV, the carpet appeared vacuumed in some areas and "untouched" in others. On our sedan, the trunk was not touched. We left empty compartments open for vacuuming/cleaning; that didn't happen. On both vehicles, the seats were not vacuumed.  The interior side of the windows had streaks and smudges. We won't go back.

name: Tory Meeks
text: On the spot has always done a superb job on my truck. I let nobody else touch my truck except on the spot. The customer service is 10/10. The employees always put the customers first, which is something I love most about on the spot. I have been recommending them to everyone for a couple years and will continue to do so.

name: Ingrid Royster
text: Great job!  I just had the 2nd level car wash but the car, tires and carpet look great!  Everything was dusted and the windows look great!! All for $25!!  Super good deal!

name: Shar Saidla
text:
Immediate professional and friendly service!
Thank you for taking good care of me!

name: Kelli Sepanen-Proctor
text: On the Spot is always friendly and professional. I've been coming here for over two years now for their services with my vehicle. They do a nice job of cleaning, waxing and washing.

name: Jessica Koerner
text: I took my car to their University Dr location about a year ago and had a great experience. Not so much at the one here in Jones Valley. I was told the day before that if I dropped my car off before 10am the next day it was guaranteed to be done by 1pm the same day. I wanted a full detail and a headlight scrub, they quoted me $115. I dropped it off at 9:45, and 1pm came and went. Around 4pm no one had called me. I called and they it would be done by 5, and that of course the 1pm was no longer guaranteed. I showed up at 5 and had to wait until 5:30 in the lobby. Then when I went to pay, they added on $65 to the headlight scrub, which was implied upfront would be a part of my detail job. This $65 quote was not on the original estimate, although it was notated they would clean the headlights. Not a fun time!

name: Paul Revy
text: Took my SUV to be detailed at the Bailey Cove location. They took a little longer than the estimated time to do the work, but the vehicle was immaculate when they were done. Recommended

name: Jeremy M
text: I have been using On the Spot Auto Detailing for the last few years.  The customer service has always been great and my vehicle has always been cleaned to perfection!

name: Vitaliy Didyk
text:
Terrible service,I've paid $150 and they didn't even vacuum under the seat or in the back of the trunk but did leave me with a nice dent on the door, they charge top $ to detail the car but seems to me like they don't even know the meaning of that word.
I would highly suggest not to go to that place?do it yourself you'll definitely do a better job and I promise you it won't take as long as it does with those guys

name: Richard Klimas
text:
Excellent business.
Professional, courteous and timely service.
My car didn’t look this good when I picked it up from the dealership, brand new !?!?!
Would highly recommend !!!!!
“ I’ll be back !!!!”

name: Brad McClellan
text: Not sure I'll be going back. The crevices aren't clean, the wax appears to have scratches that weren't there before

name: Forrest Tuttle
text: First time coming here and this place is amazing, I have never seen my car so clean!!!! This is the only place I will take my car for detail and washing for as long as I live in Huntsville.

name: Thomas Hatley
text:
Twice the attendant slammed my transmission into reverse while my car was moving forward.  After waiting in line for 20 minutes before my car was washed, another customer was allowed to pull up and have his car washed while he was sitting in it and mine was unattended.  I was in no hurry, and honestly don't believe saying anything would have gotten me anywhere.  After about an hour and 15 minutes, my car left only slightly cleaner than before it got there.

Simply put.  Avoid this place.  Believe me, I wish I would have.

Edit: I was at the Hughes Road in Madison location.  Cannot speak for the other one

name: Joe Pi
text:
I decided to have my vehicle detailed which they do for $199. I spoke with Brittney on the phone to get details of the work included and to make the appointment. To sum it up, everything except the engine! I made the appointment and wednesday was there at 8:30am as scheduled. No one was there. At approximately 9 am employees showed up and took my car. Inwas told that the credit card scanner wasn’t working so I would need to bring cash.

At 430 i called and was advised my car was done. When i got there I spoke with the man cleaning the exterior of my car. I asked if they cleaned the trunk jambs as I noticed a large deposit of mud when i got groceried the other day. He said yes. I then waited about 10 minutes for my car. I watched the man open the trunk and then wipe the trunk jambs...?

It was an overcast day and the car looked good... until I got home. My chrome exhaust was still black (i rubbed with my finger and it comes off), the fuel tank door was dirty (once again my finger lifted the dirt there), large spots on the chrome grill looked untouched, large spots on the lower door panels were untouched, smears on the windshield,and spots on the rims were untouched. I paid and their CC machine did work... amazing.

I have pictures and videos of all things I mentioned.

I was going to just leave it alone but knowing I paid $200 for a half a$$ job didn’t sit well with me.

I have to say the interior was GREAT! A little excessive with the oils but you can tell they took their time and got everything looking sharp!

On Friday i called and got Brittney on the phone again. I asked for a manager and she said she would relay a message for me. I told her I’m calling to complain about the detail I got... she asked for details and i told her everything. She called back a few hours later and advised that the owner/manager said i can bring the car back. I advised that i didnt have all day to leave my car to be washed and waxed again. (I highly doubt it was even waxed as there was so many spots that were unwashed... the wax would have stuck to it). I told her honestly the interior looked great and id be ok with paying for that service but need to be reimbursed for the remainder. She basically told me that wasnt an option and that thisnis how the manager handled things. He doesnt talk to customers and just has her. I explained that im offering to pay for the work that was done correctly... most customers would just want a total refund. However, if she cant authorize that and the manager wont even talk to me to settle the issue, ill just have my CC company cancel the payment.

I feel sad for Brittney as im sure she is put in this situation often.

My advice, stay away.

name: Leidy Aquino
text: On The Spot Is The Best Place to get your Auto detail ! I will definitely recommend them to everyone ! They will have your Vehicle looking Spotless! best customer experience ive ever had  !

name: Jeff Williams
text:
I wish I read read the reviews before buying.  I went to the small location on Hughes, and they did a horrible job on my car. I got the $60.00 "Supreme" wash. This is the first time I've paid to have my car cleaned and it will probably be the last.

There is a large section on my front bumper they missed. There was cleaning product pooled in my cup holders. It looked like they had just sprayed it on in places and never wiped it off. My dash and console was all spotty, and covered in a mix of dust and cleaning spray. They did not open my hatch and vacuum the back. The front was vacuumed but not well. There was a tone of very fine loose dirt  on my from floor mats. It looked like it came from the inside of the shopvac they used to vacuum the car. I can't believe they use a shopvac for this. I have leather seats, and they did not so much as wipe them down. My back seat had dirt in it from where I had sat a pair of boots. It's still there. There are little spots all over the outside of my car. I suspect that is from the spray wax they put on. I'm not sure.

The worst part is, my car has an odor now. It smells like body odor. I think that may be from the cleaning supplies they use. I don't know. I'm cleaning my car myself this week though. I've got to get the smell out. This place is horrible. I will never go back.

name: Jason Carter
text: Very friendly service. Fast and detailed. My car looks great!

name: Richard Ensley
text: This is the best detail job I have seen in along time, also their customer service was great.

name: Angela Whitlock
text: So I went to get my car seats and carpet shampooed (interior package). First of all, the package was 124.00!!! So right off the back I'm thinking they MUST be excellent at their job. I was sadly mistaken! I dropped the car off in the morning after making an appointment online. I asked the guy on duty about what time the car would be done. He said "about 1pm". I was cool with that. So I left and went to run errands. Around 1:30pm I called the place to find out the status. The woman who answered the phone put me on hold for over 5 min so I hung up and drove to the place to see how things were going. When I got there there was an older woman complaining about a previous job they did to her car. I just remember her saying "someone owes me 10 bucks to fix this". Anyway, one worker sees me and says "would you like to see your car?" I said yes and followed him into the garage. The car STILL had the dark brown stains on the carpets! Before I can point it out he says "I couldn't get it out. You should try dying the carpet." I was upset because the car also looked like they didn't vacuum well... if at all! Then there were dirt spots on my back window. The door jams were STILL dirty! The tires were dirty and the front bumper!  I ran my finger on both and lifted black dirt from those areas! They uses the wrong cleaning material on my middle console that caused paint to come off. I was very upset and dissatisfied snice I left it there for almost 6 hours already! I asked to speak with the manager. I told him this was no where near a good job for that price. After some deliberation, he agreed to knock off 25.00. This was a bit of a relief, but honestly, that was a 50.00 job (at best). THEN... about 2 hours later, that woman calls me back and says "your car is ready for pickup". I told her I already picked it up. She said "oh I guess I called the wrong person". I'm so annoyed with this place! They are so unorganized. Save your money and go elsewhere where they do a job that fits the amount that they are charging you. This was a waste of time. I would recommend Melvins On the Spot Car Wash in Florence, AL if you are in that area. He has had that business for 30 years! They know how to do it right and have better prices!

name: Pat Guettler
text: I won't take my car anywhere else. Great staff. Super attentive to detail.

name: john lang
text:
I read the reviews and was hesitant to buy a Groupon, but I'm pretty low maintenance, so I figured it would be fine. Nope.

3 hours turned in to 8 hours. We had scheduled a 9:00 appointment and I was on the road @ 5:05 after they completed the second car. Initially, they told me around 12:00. I had to kick up a fuss to even get them to begin after 3 hours.

They didn't vacuum the whole car until I asked them about it.

After I got home I discovered they hadn't even washed the roof of the SUV, much less waxed it.

While we were there they lost a center cap off of some guy's BMW. The best they could do was "sorry."

Even with a Groupon discount it was a waste of a day and not even worth the $130 I paid for two cars.

name: Ray Phillips
text: Great car wash they do a good job in a  timely manner don't have to watt long

name: David Schultz
text: Don't waste your time or money on these people. They are extremely overpriced and do a piss poor job. I could have washed my vehicle better with a toothbrush and a garden hose.

name: Lewis Metts
text: Locations in Madison and Jones Valley.  Have used them both.  Fantastic work!

name: Rachel Baines
text:
Absolutely terrible service. Save your money and go elsewhere!

I thought maybe the other reviewers were exaggerating a tad so I decided to give this place a shot and purchased a groupon. Now I'm out $60 and my car still looks terrible. Really disappointed.  Dealing with these people was a nightmare from the get go, and now I'll have to spend more money to take my car elsewhere and have it washed and waxed properly. Do yourself a favor and stay away.

name: Ryan McMahon
text: Great expierence and very clean car! Quick to clean it up too! Thanks!

name: Douglas Meeks
text:
I have 3 cars but I have a 2005 Freestyle that I use for hauling things (like my dogs) and it is never all that clean but one day recently I was picking up one of my dogs after a bath (black haired dog) and they had forgotten to brush him out good and I had a ton of dog hair all in my car and it was overdue for a cleaning.  I took it to On-The_Spot and the guy offered me a price that I thought was too low so I made him come out and look at the mess and he added like $10.  The thing is when they got finished several hours later and I came to pick it up it looked like a freakin' miracle it was so clean (close to new car clean) so I gave them a $20 tip and paid the fee gladly since I could never have done it and even if I had tried to do it myself the finished product would have looked like trash in comparison to the job they did for me.  5 Star service in my book

Douglas C. Meeks
Amazon Top 500 ​VINE ​Reviewer, Goodreads Top 1% Reviewer, Reviewer for  Wicked Scribes and Kindle Book Review

name: Breanna Burt
text: jv location is a great on the spot location.i took my car in to get cleaned earlier today and the guys did a very outstanding job.would recommend them.clean waiting area,smells beautiful,respectful and polite customer service...will see you guys again when i need my car cleaned again

name: XKingXclusiveX Gaming
text: Best on the spot car wash location in Jones Valley

name: Michael Pryor
text: Bring my car once a month....they do an excellent job !!!! Only one I trust with my vehicles in ON THE SPOT!!!

text: Did a  great  job, very courteous and got car right in with no wait!

name: Tremayne Gilbert
text: Nice place to get car wash will be back again

text: Me love this carwash. Great service

name: Wes Cold
text: Great customer service  clean environment great at what they do they will have you in and out fast as well

name: Michael Vollmer
text:
Worst car wash ever. Basically they just spayed it with water. I've used them twice and each time it has came back dirty. Last time they didn't even wax it but charged me $75 for it. Stay away.

I was burned by the groupon scan too.

name: Chad Watts
text: They do a great job. Will be coming back.

name: Daniel Staples
text:
Dp not use this location. (I don't know about the others). I bought the Groupon for the expensive one that says " Supreme Service Wash, Swirl Remover, Polishing Crème, Banana Crème Wax - A FAST AND EASY WAY TO ELIMINATE SWIRLS FROM BOTH FRESH AND CURED PAINT SURFACES. " Its a $135 service so it better be good. NOPE.

The car was kind of shiny but no swirls were removed. In fact, I would say the shining made it look worse than before. The carpet had a basic vacuum but some dirt and dog hair remained in spots. The only bright spot was the dash was well done. I can't imagine they spent more than 30 mins TOPS on the car leaving it the way it was. Not worth even the Groupon discount. Super disappointed. Will NEVER return.

name: edwardcruz82
text: Walked in and was able to get my car washed on the spot.

name: Terrian Patrice
text: Very clean environment and the service was great!

name: Tracy Reynolds
text: Always the best. Never disappointed!

name: Ronald Lucid
text: These guys are awesome!!!!!!! I have been going for years to them when they were on University Drive and now in Madison at there new facility.

name: Woodrow Bowling
text: My wife took her Camara there, and they stole the rear floor mats. 6 weeks later, I've heard, we ordered them and waiting for delivery...they came but to other location...you can't contact the owner because all numbers forward to the Madison site. Bad enough they stole the factory floor mats, but to have religious Christian quotes on the walls and do this! These people should be closed down.

name: Rebecca Shaughnessy
text: Clean, quiet waiting area, have specials and Groupon discounts. Have been here several times and will return.

The inside of my car wasn't properly cleaned and wax was all over my car. Smh
Hughes Rd. location

name: Michael Kelley
text: Needed to get my OCD in check and clean the car. Everything worked like new and the AO was clean. Awesome little quarter wash

name: Tammy Cornelison
text: This used to be the best car wash in town but it's gone down hill, for the automatic wash. I went yesterday and asked if they were working as the past several times things didn't work properly. I was told they were working but they weren't. Soap barely comes out and one roller didn't work at all.  The undercarriage wash never came on. At the end my car stopped for a bit before the track engaged again.  I wouldn't recommend anything more than the self wash or maybe the automatic wash and rinse only.

name: Jessy Dykes
text: I would not even give this place 1 star, as it does not deserve it. I bought the most expensive wash using the touch free automatic. IT DID NOT EVEN USE SOAP ON MY CAR. My car still has bugs and dust all over it. No one will answer the phones, and there is no attendant. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY HERE!!!!

name: Joni Hancock
text: absolute waste of money. I stopped in on my through town 3/4 of the car wash settings do not work( triple shine wax, spot free rinse, etc) the foam brush hardly dispensed suds, free vacs were not available.  Again complete waste of time and money will not be back.

name: April Dawson
text: I give the vaccums a 5 star.... But I've lost $10 trying to get in the automatic car wash and never got my money back after emailing them. But overall its clean and I just wash my car myself.

name: robbie brown
text: It sucked no soap came out of hose or the brush the water pressure was real low should of went across town

text: Light didn't work in the stall, coin changer was out of order, soap seletion didn't have any soap.

text: Great car wash with excellent people that work there

name: Anthony Reed
text: Clean stalls.... good deal for the money

name: LaTasha McClendon-Dove
text: This was the worst car wash I have ever been to. I paid for the $7 wash because the $8 wasn’t working. I went through the automatic wash and it never put soap on my car and there wasn’t even a drying option. There is still dirt all over my car. They only had 3 open vacuum’s and they don’t have enough power to suck up paper from the car floor. I will NEVER use this car wash again. Don’t waste your money

name: Phyllis Gregory
text: Not worth it !! I have lost money and complained only to be told I will have to come when owner is here. came here today to waste $5.00 on hot water only. every button I pushed only got me hot water. Pressure was good just nothing else You would think when it's almost self serve that they would make sure everything worked properly

name: James “Jestor” Foster
text:
Did the brushless automatic. Most of the side nozzles do not work. The place is dark, and kinda sketchy.

I'm from out of state, and will be looking for a better car wash tomorrow..

text: Really great vacuum..the self wash work's well. Got my car really clean.only took $4.00 to get it done.

text: I put 20 min on the clock just to find out  there was no tire cleaner and the soap didnt work  I was very disappointed

text: don’t waste your money at this place you will get cheated it is very seldom I come here the last time was five years ago barely any soap spit out all I got was water sprayed on my car. this past Fourth of July I thought I would give it another try of course the same thing no soap no clearcoat and no spot free rinse. this is nothing new to the people that own this place because this has been going on for years but this will be the last time they cheat me.

text: spent 10 bucks trying to clean sap off and no soap or anything wouldnt suvvest this place

text: Dont waste your time or money. Half the sprayers didn't work leaving soap on the car. Also all of the Vacuums were non working .

name: Mac Miller
text: Full cans no change rude people. I’d rather stay at home.

name: Patrick Healey
text: Paid 7 dollars to have my car rinsed three times.    Touchless needs some maintenance.

name: edward sarkisian
text: Traveling long distance, needed a quick vacuum,  but had to pay for a wash to get the free vacuum. So we settled for a 5 dollar quick wash. We entered our Money, drove into the wash, nothing happened. Then an employee walked up behind our vehicle, went to the cash dispenser and told us to drive through. We waited and waited but the wash didn't start. So we drove around to talk with the guy, and all he wanted to do was argue with us. He told me to call the number on the door, goes to an unknown number that no one answers. WE stayed there to see if maybe he would try to help but instead ate his lunch in front of us.....i believe this place cons you for your money..DO NOT GO!!! WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER JUST TO SETTLE ANYWAYS AND WE DIDNG EVEN GET OUR WASH. Lost 5 bucks, so I'm writing this bc it's the point of the matter. it had 3.8 rating now I know why

text: I don't usually leave bad reviews but this was the worst car wash experience I've had to date. I pulled in and put my $1.50 in the machine, nothing happened. I moved to another spot. The foam brush soap was a drizzle of dirty soap water. Uggg! The hose had so much dirt on it my car is scratched. All in all I spent $8 on the wash and my car was dirtier than it was when I got there. Went to the drink machine to get a drink and it took my $1.25. Didn't bother to use the vacuum. I wouldn't was my car here if I had unlimited free washes. It was a waste of my time, energy and money.

name: Eric&nichol Tindol
text: Wow!!! I love this place. It's convenient for one. Most businesses may have a car wash but they don't have vacuuming and cleaning areas for everybody. Or the may be a place to use a vacuum but definitely not a car wash as well. The vaccums and car wash prep areas are complimentary with every car wash. There prices start at $6. But that's not where their service stops. They have a very knowledgeable staff and a family friendly atmosphere. I'm a Iraq veteran. And I feel completely at home here. There's one employee I'd like to give a personal shout out to. Thank you Mr. Ryan for personally making sure that my visit start to finish was a blast and completely stress free. And here's an extra 🌟. For you. Because this is definitely a 6 🌟 rates business!!

resp.text: Thank you for your business friend! Makes us happy that you're happy!

My only two complaints were that the ATM didn’t work and that the bathroom wasn’t clean .  10/24/20

text: Somewhat disappointed.  Took a already pretty clean car to have made ready to sell and when I got home realized they hadn't even opened the trunk to vacuum or wipe down.

name: Stephanie McMillin
text: Today was the first time bringing my car to Melvins (or any car wash for that matter, lol) and they did an AMAZING job! My car was very dirty and they had their work cut out for them, but they did not disappoint! I haven't seen a legit clean floorboard in years 🤣 Thank you for detailing my car! I'll never go back to a drive-thru car wash again!

name: Jenna Nicole
text: Melvin’s was truly a very good surprise! After calling and no one answering for weeks looking for someone to detail both my husbands and my car, we were greated with a gentleman signing “melllvvvinns” on the phone. That has me immediately happy. He told us to be there by 10:30 this morning. We got there and they were busy but took both our cars, we traded them out, when one was done we brought the other one back. They had my husbands filthy car cleaned in 3 hours and had it looking shiny and brand new. I was shocked for them to get out all the years of stains and grime! I then gave them my car and was also pleased with the work. It was shiny as well and sparkling clean. The prices are truly AMAZING! If I was Melvin, I would UP those prices because it’s almost a steal for all the beautiful work they do. Mr. Melvin I learned is a Pastor and drives some miles to preach on Sunday mornings, he seems so happy and kind! I was very impressed, actually overly impressed with the work and the time it took. I hope everyone gives this place a real chance and they will truly be in awe. What a great find in the Shoals area. Wow!

name: Fred Johnson
text: Affordable, professional and quality car detailing company in Florence, AL! My car always looks like a new one after them! Thanks!

These guys are good!

name: Marlana Allison
text: I am very annoyed because they were supposed to shampoo out my vehicle and after it started raining this past week it smells like a dead body in my car which wouldn’t happen if it had truly been cleaned. Didn’t even clean my visor mirrors or dust out vents in car. I will not be coming back here!!! Looked under the mat a few days later after the smell was in my car and there was a slimy milky substance under my mat on the passenger side right where I had spilled the milk in my vehicle!!! My hubby was gonna bring his vehicle to get cleaned but you better believe he won’t be!!!

Maybe I expected too much but when I was told it'd come out showroom new looking I just thought they'd get rid of the bugs in the back windshield, and clean the white spots off the seats, clear the displays, etc. I've since been told of a place that does a better job for 2/3 the price, and they'll come get your car then drop it back off for you. Plus, the area of town the ship is in made me hesitant to go back. It felt unsafe there.

name: Toni{JuneBug} Evans-Henderson
text: Nice lil Car Wash & VACCUM cleaners to do a great quick wash on your car or do a detailed more expensive&more intense wash plus has carpet shampooer to clean seats, carpets,floor mats ECT.U can do a small less expensive wash& VACCUM or spend a lil more& shampoo seats,carpet&anywhere else that can be cleaned w/a carpet/upholstery shampooer. They also sell anything u may need 2do a good job cleaning your car in machines at car wash like- Armoral,Wheel cleaner,air freshener,cleaning wipes for dash,console,cup holders,U name it&u can clean it up here&won't cost u a fortune 2do so.U also never know whom u may see at the 4way stop Carwash in Greenpond.I enjoy not havin 2travel far at all 2get a great quality clean inside & out on your car,truck or SUV's.Btw-They even take debit cards which is very convenient. I'd have 2say yes I'd recommend this car wash&vaccums 2any1 lookin 4a great place 2wash your vehicle&if needing any upholstery shampooed this is your One Stop Place for all...
